text: kya tumane nahin dekha ki allaah ne aakaash se paanee utaara, phir dharatee mein usake srot pravaahit kar die; phir usane dvaara khetee nikaalata hai, jisake vibhinn rang hote hai; phir vah sookhane lagatee hai; phir tum dekhate ho ki vah peelee pad gaee; phir vah use choorn-vichoorn kar deta hai? nissandeh isamen buddhi aur samajhavaalon ke lie badee yaadadihaanee hai
